name: 張文中　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: This Robotics and Automation Applications (RAA) course is offered only for limited undergraduate students with programming experience. RAA focuses on projects in the areas of optical inspection, mobile robots, manipulators, visual servoing, and automation. 機器人與自動化應用 (RAA) 適合大學生修習，因設備因素修課人數有限，須具備程式能力。課程專題聚焦於光學檢測、移動式機器人、機械手臂、視覺伺服與自動化。

scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of attendance 10%, homework 10%, class projects 50%, final project proposal and paper presentation 10%, and final project 20%. 學期成績權重比例：出席 10%，作業 10%，課程專題 50%，期末專題提案及論文簡報 10 %，期末專題 20%。
